net.grinder.util.thread
Interface InterruptibleRunnable

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractTCPProxyEngine.FilteredStreamThread
public interface InterruptibleRunnable

Like Runnable, but guarantees that interruptibleRun() will be cleanly exited if the thread is interrupted.

Author:
Philip Aston
See Also:
For policy on handling interrupted threads.

Method Summary
 void interruptibleRun()
          A run method that guarantees to exit if the thread is interrupted, perhaps by throwing UncheckedInterruptedException.
 

Method Detail

interruptibleRun

void interruptibleRun()
A run method that guarantees to exit if the thread is interrupted, perhaps by throwing UncheckedInterruptedException.
